headline.short: Doing Nothing Could Cost You Everything.
headline.medium: Without workplace violence prevention training, your hospital faces fines, your staff risks injury, and your patient care is compromised.
It's time to build a sustainable culture of safety at your organization that keeps all staff out of harm’s way.

headline.short: Penalties and Fines Are Just the Start.
headline.medium: When it comes to regulatory oversight, one complaint can lead to countless costs in dollars—and reputation.
